channel.title: Searching for a source
channel.description:
Will someone please give me a link for a good rs source. I'm looking for a fairly well done server (not pk) that is similar to the real RuneScape 2. (just need a headstart so I can make a server SOMEWHAT like it)
A few things:
Working duel arena Working equipment requirements Full Skills (no summoning, just music in music tab. Also, Ancients in left side tab. (not necessary)) Full mage with runes and levels & Full ancients with runes and levels (Teleports working too) NPCs i dont really care about, i will change them around Keep 3 best items when you die
Sorry that I'm being so picky, will give person co-ownership, and credits in every menu. ;) That's pretty much all I could think of at the moment. PM me if you know of a source/let me use it.

item.title: Searching for a source
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Teh Moose:

Deltascape has most of that except duel arena…

Nuke207:

wasn’t there a real about giving co owner if helped or something? meh

I doubt he cares, this thread is well over a year and a half old.

Read full topic

Will someone please give me a link for a good rs source. I’m looking for a fairly well done server (not pk) that is similar to the real RuneScape 2. (just need a headstart so I can make a server SOMEWHAT like it)
